TopicTitle: Mechjeb 2 installed with VKAN, is enabled on every command module without mechjeb module?

Articles.Content:
Hi! I'm playing on 1.12.5, I installed mechjeb through CKAN, it automatically installed something called module manager. After I launched the game I noticed each rocket had mechjebs menu enabled, without the mechjeb module on the rocket... So I did some experimenting, when I removed the module manager 4.1.4 DLL, mechjeb functions properly and only works with the mechjeb module on the rocket now?

 

what's going on? How can I fix this???

MechJeb is SUPPOSED to work on every vessel, requiring the separate module is a very old feature that has long been abandoned and only exists to avoid breaking something if someone tries to load a very old craft file or save. If you’re playing science or career mode then different MechJeb features are unlocked through tech tree research.

ModuleManager is needed for most (nearly all) mods to function correctly so don’t delete it.

You’ve posted in the KSP2 section of the forums, there are separate areas for KSP and KSP2 and the KSP section has been shrunk somewhat since KSP2 was released so it can be hard to find the right place. A moderator should move this to the KSP1 support area shortly.

Edited March 1, 2023 by jimmymcgoochie
Moved to KSP1 tech support modded.
